PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2010-07752010-06-17,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  HERITAGE
ActPublic Service Employment Act
SubjectStudent Employment Programs Participants Exclusion Approval Order
PrecisSTUDENT EMPLOYMENT PROGRAMS EXCLUSION APPROVAL ORDER in order to approve a) the re-application of the provisions of the Public Service Employment Act to the persons and positions excluded by Order in Council P.C. 1997-488; b) the exclusion from the specific provisions of the Act to participants in various federal student employment programs for the purposes of hiring.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2010-0046 Publication Date: 2010-07-07
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Student Employment Programs Participants Exclusion Approval Order
precis: STUDENT EMPLOYMENT PROGRAMS EXCLUSION APPROVAL ORDER in order to approve a) the re-application of the provisions of the Public Service Employment Act to the persons and positions excluded by Order in Council P.C. 1997-488; b) the exclusion from the specific provisions of the Act to participants in various federal student employment programs for the purposes of hiring.
